content: put your own spin on christmas this little tree is quick to make can be pressed flat for easy storage/postage/putting in a card is great for using up little pieces of yarn and is super cute this pattern is based on lots of other free patterns and tutorials available online this version has just been slightly adapted to add a more decorative edge it uses simple stitches and is a great project for anyone from beginners to advanced crocheters **materials required ** * 2 5mm hook * 4 ply yarn in three colours shown here in *gingerbread* <1g *lime zest* ~2 5g and *snow* ~1g gauge is not crucial for this design you just want a fabric that is firm and will hold its shape if fabric is too loose/floppy go down a hook size or two or use a heavier yarn happy making
